title: NewPipe stopped working? Download this hotfix update right away
content:
NewPipe is a popular open-source YouTube client that shot to popularity during the pandemic. The app lets you enjoy ad-free YouTube videos without having to pay for YouTube Premium. It’s also a perfect alternative for the main YouTube app for devices that don’t have Google Play Services installed â€” Huawei phones, for example. The app

The post NewPipe stopped working? Download this hotfix update right away appeared first on xda-developers.
description: NewPipe 0.21.16 fixes the video player decryption bug that broke the app. Download the latest update right away.
